pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Series, Analysis and Application // Accompanies the book Rainer Schlittgen and Cristina Sattarhoff (2020) https://www.degruyter.com/ "Angewandte Zeitreihenanalyse mit R, 4. Auflage" . The package contains the time series and functions used therein. It was developed over many years teaching courses about time series analysis.
